title: Goa Beach Weekend Getaway - Paradise Found
summary: Immerse yourself in Goa's golden beaches, Portuguese heritage, and vibrant nightlife. Experience the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure with beach activities, historic fort explorations, authentic Goan cuisine, and sunset cruises along the Arabian Sea.
inclusions: Private airport transfers in AC vehicle
Daily continental breakfast with Goan specialties
Guided heritage walk in Old Goa
Spice plantation tour with authentic lunch
Welcome drink and beach bonfire evening
policies: Free cancellation up to 7 days before travel. 50% cancellation charges between 3-7 days. No refunds within 72 hours of departure. Weather-dependent activities may be rescheduled.

title: Kerala Backwaters Spiritual Retreat
summary: Experience the serene backwaters of Kerala with houseboat stays, Ayurvedic treatments, and cultural immersion.
policies: Free cancellation up to 10 days before travel. 50% cancellation charges between 5-10 days. No refunds within 5 days of departure.

title: Kashmir Valley Paradise - Heaven on Earth
summary: Experience the unparalleled beauty of Kashmir, often called 'Paradise on Earth'. Stay in luxury houseboats on Dal Lake, witness snow-capped peaks in Gulmarg, explore alpine meadows in Pahalgam, and immerse yourself in the rich Kashmiri culture with saffron gardens, Mughal architecture, and traditional handicrafts.
inclusions: Premium deluxe houseboat stay on Dal Lake
Helicopter ride over Kashmir Valley (weather permitting)
Gondola cable car rides in Gulmarg
Shikara rides on Dal Lake with Kahwa tea
Visit to Mughal Gardens (Nishat, Shalimar, Chashme Shahi)
Saffron field tour with local family interaction
All meals with authentic Kashmiri cuisine
policies: Free cancellation up to 15 days before travel. 50% cancellation charges between 7-15 days. No refunds within 7 days of departure. Weather-dependent activities subject to local conditions.

4 nights accommodation in centrally located 4-star hotels
